definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: His work partakes of the aesthetic fashions of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品具有當時的某些審美時尚。

sentences.english: Finally, to seek a corresponding point of the audiences from home and abroad under the globalizational context.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化語境下，尋求中外觀衆審美需求的契合點。

sentences.english: Nanyang opera developed its own characteristics in its history.
sentences.chinese: 在長期的發展過程中，宛梆形成了獨特的審美特徵。

sentences.english: The aesthetic reception of Cui Liang Chai is at different levels.
sentences.chinese: 《催糧差》的審美接受具有層次性。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the Language of Art is an aesthetic language that is full of lingering charm.
sentences.chinese: 因此藝術語言成爲一種耐人咀嚼的審美語言。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is "Artistic Conception of Image Combination of Poetry in Late-Tang-Dynasty Poetic Form".
sentences.chinese: 第四章“晚唐體詩歌意象組合的審美境界”。

sentences.english: The aesthetic value-orientation of literature in Wei-Jin limes and the Six Dynasties obviously advocated "purity".
sentences.chinese: 魏晉六朝文學審美價值取向明顯尚清。

sentences.english: The second part of this paper mainly discussed Lhe aesthetic education of watercolor.
sentences.chinese: 文章的第二部分主要論述的是水彩藝術的審美與教學。

sentences.english: We ought to preserve this ancient art with modern aesthetic consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 要以現代審美意識開創經典。

sentences.english: An artistic image is a main carrier of aesthetic value.
sentences.chinese: 藝術形象是審美價值的主要載體。

sentences.english: Mold-making and aesthetic characteristics belong to one important element for the vein patterns of brocades of the Tujia people.
sentences.chinese: 造型與審美特徵是土家織錦紋樣構成的重要因素。

sentences.english: Lots of Libra people are artistic and appreciate beautiful things.
sentences.chinese: 許多天平座人都很有藝術細胞而和審美眼光。

sentences.english: The audiences' this very aesthetic standard should be taken into consideration when producing a film or a TV series.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆的這種審美心理是影視製作者應該認真考慮的。

sentences.english: Free-flying aesthetes in the skies of Russia conclude the World Artistic Skydiving Championships.
sentences.chinese: 自由飛行審美家欣賞在俄羅斯舉行的世界跳傘錦標賽。

sentences.english: The Taoist aesthetic is the most important subsidiary current in Chinese traditional aesthetic cultural river system.
sentences.chinese: 道教審美文化是中國傳統審美文化河系的重要支流。

sentences.english: The Taoist aesthetic is the most important subsidiary current in Chinese traditional aesthetic cultural river system.
sentences.chinese: 道教審美文化是中國傳統審美文化河系的重要支流。
